Title: Prove One's Mettle
Description:
Yes, you helped us out with these pests, but it is not enough. I need more.

One of the areas near our town has been overrun by shadow. If you are truly not being controlled by your... strange background, you would have no problem destroying the source of this danger, would you?
ObjectivesText: Defeat the Coalesced Iniquity in Rumshackle.
PortraitGiverText: A roiling manifestation of darkness in Hallowfall.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Speak to Derill Fayn at Rumshackle.
CompletionText: If you are truly here to help the Arathi, you would have no problem with what I am asking of you.
RewardText:
I have been following the Church of the Sacred Flame since the moment I was born. Doctrine is hard to set aside.

But I see now that you are here to help. And as long as you use your powers for us, I will reach out a hand of friendship--regardless of where that power came from.
